name: Mountaineer VR
description:
VR Climbing Simulation Game on a giant snowy mountain. Will you be able to reach the top?


You're a professional mountaineer in the middle of the woods near your camp. On the horizon you see a massive frozen mountain. Your mission: get to the top without dying in the process... too many times.

Experiment climbing in a natural environment thanks to immersive virtual reality. A massive mountain, atmospheric effects, realistic ambient sounds, immersive setting, climbing, locomotion, flare guns... all developed and designed to enjoy it in virtual reality.

Developed with Unity and UnityXR. Created and tested using Oculus Quest 2, but it can be tested with other devices and controllers with a similar button disposition. You need a virtual reality device and controllers to play it.

I hope you enjoy!
